details.creator: veraPDF Consortium
details.name: ISO 14289-2:2024 - 8.2 Logical structure - 8.2.1 General - Struct element parent
details.description: A structure element dictionary shall contain the P (parent) entry according to ISO 32000-2:2020, 14.7.2, Table 323

rule.description: A structure element dictionary shall contain the P (parent) entry according to ISO 32000-2:2020, 14.7.2, Table 323

error.message: A structure element dictionary does not contain the P (parent) entry
